1.Title: Heartfelt Caress
1.Description: When the equipper's HP decreases, their <color=#98EFF0>Ice Sheer DMG</color> increases by <color=#2BAD00>6%</color>, stacking up to 3 times and lasting 25s. The duration of each stack is calculated separately. This effect can trigger once every 0.5s. When the equipper's HP falls to 50% of Max HP or below, CRIT Rate increases by <color=#2BAD00>20%</color>.
